reviewText: Well done on the classic car hobby.

I like the diversity of featured automobiles. The host has just the right balance of enthusiasm, knowledge, and personality.

Excellent reviews of antique, classic, rods and custom cars and shows across north America. Great tips on building/restoring these cars. Even has a segment in each show driving an antique or classic car.
anybody who loves my classic car will enjoy this DVD it has a 1936 Chevrolet Suburban the 1951 lesabre showcar that Harley earl used for his work car and firebird concept cars and more
